scripts.client:weather: npm run clean:build && set MCP_CLIENT_WEATHER_MODE=1 && node -e "import('./build/client/client.js').then(m=>m.startClient({command:'node',args:['build/weather/service.js']}))"
scripts.client:file: npm run clean:build && set MCP_CLIENT_FILE_MODE=1 && node -e "import('./build/client/client.js').then(m=>m.startClient({command:'node',args:['build/fileServer/server.js']}))"
scripts.clean: cmd /C "if exist build rmdir /S /Q build & if exist logs rmdir /S /Q logs"
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && prettier --write . && npm run build
